/// what are you doing here?
Just standing around. I don't do much. Nothing really. I don't know. There's not much to do.
But you must do something? There has to be something you can do?
Really? There's nothing to do around here?
Look at the time! Gotta go!
/// ---------------------------------------
/// who are you?
I don't know. They just put me here and left.
Do you have a name?
What's your earliest memory?
/// ---------------------------------------
/// where are we?
I have no idea. This place is weird.
I'll let you know if I find a way out.
/// ---------------------------------------
You can walk around. That's all there is to do.
I think I'll go for a walk.
/// ---------------------------------------
What's a name?
Oh ... I should go.
/// ---------------------------------------
Meeting you just now.
I have to go. Good luck with all this.
/// --------------------------------------------------------------------- /// dialogue items when given stuff from inventory
I don't really need that but thanks. Mmm ... no. Nope. Nope. Nope.
No? Really? ... I'm a little sad now.
That's pretty cool, I guess. Thanks. Ok. Whatever. Thanks Yeah, sure I'll have one. Thanks.
No problem.
Awesome! Thank you! I needed this! I've always wanted one of these! THIS! THANK YOU!
Hey, no problem at all! Glad you like it!
